storage.description: High-speed NVMe SSD for quick data access and boot times

keyFeatures.Specification: 500GB capacity, NVMe M.2 form factor, read speeds up to 3500MB/s

reviews.comment: Impressive SSD with a heatsink for better cooling. Very satisfied with the speed.
